channel.title: Machine Learning on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Portfolio

item.title: Breast Cancer Microarray Predictor
item.description: Breast cancer is called as an uncontrolled growth of breast cells that mostly occurs in women and rarely in men. In Latino America and the Caribbean for the year 2018, there were about 200.000 cases, of which approximately 50.000 died.

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: It is important that credit card companies are able to recognize fraudulent credit card transactions so that customers are not charged for items that they did not purchase.

item.title: Breast Cancer Tumor
item.description: This is a Machine Learning project that uses the breast cancer dataset, the objective is to predict the diagnosis by analyzing features of the tumor such as area, perimeter, radius, smoothness, compactness, concavity, symmetry, texture, among others.
